name: UBX-CFG-RST
description: Reset receiver / Clear backup data structures

fields.name: navBbrMask
fields.description: BBR sections to clear. Special sets: 0x0000 Hot start, 0x0001 Warm start, 0xFFFF Cold start. Bits select components: bit 0: Ephemeris, bit 1: Almanac, bit 2: Health, bit 3: Klobuchar parameters, bit 4: Position, bit 5: Clock drift, bit 6: Oscillator parameter, bit 7: UTC correction + GPS leap seconds parameters, bit 8: RTC, bit 11: SFDR Parameters, bit 12: SFDR Vehicle Monitoring Parameter, bit 13: TCT Parameters, bit 15: Autonomous orbit parameters.

fields.name: resetMode
fields.description: Reset Type: 0x00 = Hardware reset (watchdog) immediately, 0x01 = Controlled software reset, 0x02 = Controlled software reset (GNSS only), 0x04 = Hardware reset (watchdog) after shutdown, 0x08 = Controlled GNSS stop, 0x09 = Controlled GNSS start.
